body.label: Swapping Ada allocated for Tweag proposal to USDM and USDA
body.description: Securing the budgeted dollar value in equal USDM USDA allocations, while ADA-USD price is favorable.
justification: Intersect has committed to run a pilot with Tweag, for budget deliverable payments to be made with Cardano stablecoins.
Due to the lack of liquidity in Cardano stablecoins, we will use NBX and Anzens to perform OTC trades and then mint new USDM and USDA.
The destinations are wallets controlled Cardano Development holding's via NBX's custodial service and Anzens' platform.
